content:
I am a final-year undergraduate student at Tsinghua University. My research interests include machine learning and computer vision, in particular, adversarial learning, representation learning and unsupervised learning.
Currently, I am working on my undergraduate thesis on semi-supervised learning, advised by Prof. Gao Huang. Prior to that, under the supervision of Prof. Yiran Chen, I was a summer intern at Duke University and focus on the topic of privacy in machine learning.

title: Jiayi Guo
